bar_admissions.extraction_focus: fitness determination, disqualifying conduct, mitigating factors, rehabilitation evidence
bar_admissions.primary_document_hint: Look for the bar application or character and fitness disclosure form

priority_documents: Board disciplinary order or revocation notice
